name: Teeter Hero
description:
Help Dashy Cat keep the bus from toppling over while battling waves of enemies. The bus is on an unstable area, make sure to keep it level any way you can! Can you survive all 5 waves?

  • Level out the bus by punching it!
  • Use your dash for incredible speed and power!
  • Survive the waves of enemies!

Created in 72 hours forLudum Dare 49 Jam. The theme was "unstable". 

Join the Discord!

Note: The game may take a moment to load. If the game does not load you may have to enable WebGL on your browser.

Controls

  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Attack - left mouse or  left arrow
  • Dash - right mouse or right arrow
  • Full reset - 0 (zero)

** You can rebind your controls in the pause menu!
